allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add z-api message queue endpoint and disable reminder cron

Add GET /clinics/{clinicId}/queue and /queue/count endpoints to query
z-api message queue status. Disable reminder cron until ready for testing.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
docs: add PRD, integration tests, and Postman collection for 003 date format BR

Documentation for the DD/MM/YYYY date formatting feature across
scheduling and rescheduling flows.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: improve FAQ fuzzy matching with text normalization and word overlap

Add _normalize_text\(\) to strip accents/diacritics and punctuation before
matching. Replace simple substring check with 2-pass approach: normalized
substring then word-overlap scoring. Rename faq_menu button to go_faq_menu
to avoid prefix collision with faq_ extraction.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
